content.text: Calculate the amount received when 76 500 tickets are sold
Write your answer to part (a) in standard form
The price of a ticket for a football match is \$124
Gregor changes \$700 into euros (€) when the rate is €1 = \$1.4131
Write the following in order of size, **smallest** first
Leon scores the following marks in 5 tests
The sides of a rectangle are \(6.3 \text{cm}\) and \(4.8 \text{cm}\), each correct to 1 decimal place
Calculate the upper bound for the area of the rectangle
The point \(C\) lies on \(AD\) and angle \(ABC = 67^{\circ}\)
Using a straight edge and compasses only, construct the perpendicular bisector of \(AB\)
Show clearly all your construction arcs
Shania invests \$750 at a rate of \(2 \frac{1}{2} \%\) per year simple interest
Calculate the total amount Shania has after 5 years
Without using your calculator, work out \(\frac{5}{6} +\frac{9}{10}\)
You must show your working and give your answer as a mixed number in its simplest form
The region \(\boldsymbol{R}\) contains points which satisfy the inequalities
On the grid, label with the letter \(\boldsymbol{R}\) the region which satisfies these inequalities
The actual distance between two towns is \(172\mathrm{km}\)
Calculate the distance, in centimetres, between the towns on the map
The area of a lake on the map is \(12\mathrm{cm}^2\)
Calculate the actual area of the lake in \(\mathrm{km}^2\)
The scale of a map is \(1:500\,000\)
Make \(w\) the subject of the formula
Calculate the acceleration of the car during the first 25 seconds
Calculate the distance travelled by the car in the first 120 seconds
The diagram shows the speed-time graph for the first 120 seconds of a car journey
O is the origin and \(OPQRST\) is a regular hexagon
Find, in terms of \(\mathbf{p}\) and \(\mathbf{t}\), in their simplest forms,
R and \(T\) are points on a circle, centre \(O\), with radius \(5\mathrm{cm}\)
PR and \(PT\) are tangents to the circle and angle \(POT = 78^\circ\)
A thin rope goes from \(P\) to \(R\), around the major arc \(RT\) and then from \(T\) to \(P\)
Calculate the length of the rope
they are both the same colour,
exactly one of the two pencils is green
In this question, give all your answers as fractions
A box contains 3 red pencils, 2 blue pencils and 4 green pencils
Raj chooses 2 pencils at random, without replacement
